author: rcm
msg: Window border now ensure it is wide enough to incorporate the title and controls.

author: rcm
msg: Ensuring that any unset fields in the error view get assigned default values

author: rcm
msg: Controls (windows control and buttons) now use the outermost decorator as a view reference, ensuring the execute method of the action  knows the real target view.

author: rcm
msg: Implement the invalidateContent so that object views invalidate their parents' layouts resulting in views that are updated when objects change.
